user.title: Connect to UniFi UNAS
user.description: Enter your UniFi UNAS SSH credentials and MQTT broker details. Root access is required to install monitoring scripts.

data.password: UNAS SSH password (Leave blank if HA SSH keys are configured on the UNAS)

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure UniFi UNAS
reconfigure.description: Update your UniFi UNAS connection settings. The integration will reconnect and redeploy scripts with the new configuration.

data.password: UNAS SSH password (Leave blank if HA SSH keys are configured on the UNAS)

data_description.device_model: WARNING: Changing the device model requires deleting and re-adding the integration to update drive entities.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to UniFi UNAS. Please check the IP address and password/SSH key configuration.
error.timeout_connect: Connection timed out. Please check that SSH is enabled on your UniFi UNAS.
error.mqtt_cannot_connect: Failed to connect to MQTT broker. Please verify the MQTT host IP address.
error.mqtt_invalid_auth: MQTT authentication failed. Please check your MQTT username and password.
error.mqtt_timeout: MQTT connection timed out. Please verify the broker is running and accessible.
error.mqtt_library_missing: MQTT library not available. Please restart Home Assistant.
error.model_changed: Device model cannot be changed during reconfiguration. Please delete and re-add the integration to change the device model.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs.

abort.already_configured: This UniFi UNAS is already configured.
abort.mqtt_required: MQTT integration must be installed and configured before setting up UniFi UNAS. Please add the MQTT integration first, then try again.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Configuration updated successfully. The integration is reconnecting with the new settings.

init.title: UniFi UNAS Options
init.description: Configure sensor polling interval. Lower values provide more frequent updates but may increase system load.

mqtt_missing.title: MQTT Integration Required
mqtt_missing.description: The MQTT integration has been removed but is required for UniFi UNAS to function. Please re-add the MQTT integration or remove the UniFi UNAS integration.
